title: Add content to this page + use drag-and-drop to re-order it
description:
Please read 'How do I customize my Internet-in-a-Box home page?' (offline version) and watch our latest HOW-TO videos.

Then go to the Admin Console (see default passwords) and click on the Install Content and Content Menus tabs.

Raspberry Pi guides and Internet-in-a-Box tech docs are available to you even when offline: http://box/info
